title: @Meddler--Does the patch 6.13 "not lose out-of-combat MS when attacking wards" apply to Bard?
body: I'm referring to the bonus MS he gains while collecting chimes.

replies.body: It doesn't apply to Bard yet. We'll be making it so hitting wards doesn't count as in combat for purposes of Bard's passive, Wanderer (the Mastery) and Cloud Drake in a future patch though.
Meddler forgot the TM after soon
